statements: SELECT * FROM products WHERE category='Electronics' ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price > 100 ORDER BY date_sold ASC;
SELECT product_name, category FROM products WHERE date_sold >= '2022-01-01' AND date_sold <= '2022-03-31';
SELECT product_id, product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE category='Clothing' ORDER BY product_id;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE category='Food' AND unit_price < 50 ORDER BY date_sold DESC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY unit_price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, category, unit_price FROM products WHERE date_sold > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date_sold, unit_price DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY product_id;
SELECT product_name, date_sold FROM products WHERE category = 'Clothing' AND unit_price < 50 ORDER BY date_sold DESC;
SELECT AVG(unit_price) AS average_price, category FROM products GROUP BY category HAVING COUNT(*) > 3 ORDER BY average_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT sale_date, quantity, amount FROM sales ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_sales, AVG(amount) AS average_amount FROM sales;
SELECT p.product_name, s.sale_date, s.quantity FROM products p JOIN sales s ON p.product_id = s.product_id WHERE s.quantity > 5 ORDER BY s.sale_date ASC;
SELECT category, COUNT(*) AS total_products FROM products GROUP BY category HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY total_products DESC;
SELECT * FROM product_category;
SELECT category_name, category_id FROM product_category ORDER BY category_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM product WHERE category_id=1 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM sales WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT sale_id, product_name, quantity FROM product p JOIN sales s ON p.product_id = s.product_id;
SELECT * FROM product_category WHERE category_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM product WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT sale_id, sale_date, quantity FROM sales WHERE quantity >= 100 ORDER BY sale_date ASC;
SELECT product_name, price, category_name FROM product p JOIN product_category pc ON p.category_id = pc.category_id;
SELECT category_name, COUNT(*) as total_products FROM product p JOIN product_category pc ON p.category_id = pc.category_id GROUP BY category_name;
SELECT * FROM product_category;
SELECT category_name, category_id FROM product_category ORDER BY category_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM product WHERE price > 50;
SELECT product_name, category_id FROM product ORDER BY category_id, product_name;
SELECT product_id, sale_date, quantity FROM sales WHERE quantity >= 10 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM product ORDER BY product_name DESC, price ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, price, category_name FROM product JOIN product_category ON product.category_id = product_category.category_id WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT product_name, sale_date, quantity FROM product JOIN sales ON product.product_id = sales.product_id ORDER BY sale_date DESC, quantity ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT category_name, AVG(avg_daily_sales) as average_sales FROM daily_sales_avg JOIN product_category ON daily_sales_avg.category_id = product_category.category_id GROUP BY category_name HAVING AVG(avg_daily_sales) > 500 ORDER BY average_sales DESC;
SELECT product_name, price, quantity FROM product JOIN sales ON product.product_id = sales.product_id WHERE price BETWEEN 20 AND 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 100;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM products ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT category_name, AVG(avg_daily_sales) FROM categories c JOIN category_sales_avg cs ON c.category_id = cs.category_id GROUP BY category_name;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE category_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT category_name, COUNT(*) AS product_count FROM products JOIN categories ON products.category_id = categories.category_id GROUP BY category_name;
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM products JOIN sales ON products.product_id = sales.product_id WHERE sale_amount > 100;
SELECT category_id, AVG(sale_amount) AS avg_sale_amount FROM sales GROUP BY category_id HAVING AVG(sale_amount) > 200;
